videos.headline: Michigan players dye hair in tribute to Chad Carr
videos.description: Wolverines players Chase Winovich, Maurice Hurst dye their hair orange in honor of Lloyd Carr's grandson Chad, who died of brain cancer. To date Michigan has raised over $200,000.

videos.headline: South Carolina fumbles punt
videos.description: Chris Lammons has Michigan's punt slip through his hands and it's recovered by the Wolverines' Ambry Thomas. Michigan would follow up with a field goal.

videos.headline: South Carolina suffers second turnover
videos.description: Gamecocks QB Jake Bentley fumbles and Chase Winovich immediately recovers for the Wolverines' second takeaway of the first quarter.

videos.headline: Muschamp: 'We've moved the ball and created tempo'
videos.description: South Carolina head coach Will  Muschamp breaks down how his team has has performed well on defense but offense needs to improve in the second half.

videos.headline: Mason punches it in for Wolverines TD
videos.description: Michigan's Ben Mason plunges in from one yard out to give the Wolverines a 16-3 lead against South Carolina

videos.headline: Peters connects with Crawford for big gain
videos.description: Brandon Peters finds an open Kekoa Crawford for a 27-yard catch to get the Wolverines in the red zone.

videos.headline: Nanni uses Twitter to become the Bloomin' Onion Man
videos.description: Ryan Nanni of SB Nation appears as the Bloomin' Onion man after achieving his goal of getting 10k retweets on Twitter.

videos.headline: Gamecocks capitalize on turnover with 21-yard TD
videos.description: Jake Bentley throws a perfect pass to Bryan Edwards in the end zone for a touchdown late in the third quarter against Michigan.

videos.headline: Michigan has costly turnover in own territory
videos.description: Sean McKeon fumbles the handoff and is recovered by Gamecocks' Javon Kinlaw, making it Michigan's second turnover of the quarter.

videos.headline: Bentley hits Smith for 53-yard TD to take lead
videos.description: Jake Bentley goes deep and connects with Shi Smith for a 53-yard touchdown to take a lead over the Wolverines.

videos.headline: Michigan has costly turnover in own territory
videos.description: Sean McKeon fumbles the handoff and is recovered by Gamecocks' Javon Kinlaw, making it Michigan's second turnover of the quarter.

videos.headline: SC VS MICH
SC VS MICH
Michigan's Peters is picked off deep in USC territory
videos.description: Brandon Peters' pass is intercepted in the end zone by JaMarcus King, resulting in a touchback for the Gamecocks.

videos.headline: South Carolina chips away at Michigan's lead with TD
videos.description: Jake Bentley passes to Rico Dowdle, who runs through traffic to the end zone for an 18-yard Gamecocks touchdown.

videos.headline: Michigan gives up 4th turnover of 2nd half
videos.description: Donovan Peoples-Jones cannot control the punt and it bounces off his helmet for a fumble which is recovered by the South Carolina's A.J. Turner.

videos.headline: South Carolina seals win with INT
videos.description: In the final minutes of the fourth quarter, Brandon Peters' pass is picked off by South Carolina's Steven Montac, securing an Outback Bowl win for South Carolina.

videos.headline: Bentley: 'A real team effort today'
videos.description: South Carolina QB Jake Bentley gets emotional dedicating this win to his father and the Gamecocks seniors.

videos.headline: Turnovers key to South Carolina's win
videos.description: Dusty Dvoracek and Adam Amin break down how the Gamecocks capitalized on the Wolverines' mistakes in their 26-19 Outback Bowl victory.

videos.headline: South Carolina rallies to beat Michigan in Outback Bowl
videos.description: Behind two Jake Bentley touchdown passes and five forced turnovers, South Carolina overcomes a 16-point deficit to defeat Michigan 26-19 in the Outback Bowl.

videos.headline: Harbaugh laments Outback Bowl loss
videos.description: Michigan head coach Jim Harbaugh blames coaching decisions for the loss in the Outback Bowl and gives an update on his future with the Wolverines.

tracking.trackingName: NCF Presser (Harbaugh laments Outback Bowl loss) 2018/1/1 ESHEET
